question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. sheep
B. man in vintage outfit
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The man in the vintage outfit is standing further back in the scene, behind the sheep, and his posture and position relative to the background tents confirm he is farther away than the sheep in the foreground.
